UTM Campus Assistant Chatbot - Administrator Manual

Welcome to the UTM Campus Assistant Chatbot Administrator Manual. This comprehensive guide provides all the information needed to configure, manage, and maintain the campus facility management system.

System Overview

The UTM Campus Assistant Chatbot is a Flask-based web application designed to streamline campus facility management through an intelligent AI-powered interface. The system serves both students and administrators with distinct functionality tailored to their roles.

Key Features: - Facility issue reporting and tracking - Facility information management and discovery - Facility booking system with approval workflow - AI-powered chatbot for natural language queries - Role-based access control (Student/Admin) - Real-time dashboard and analytics
